item.title: Golden Hour Dinners at Commons | Every Thursday
item.description: Looking for a laid-back dinner spot during the Summer? Borrow a picnic blanket from Commons, gather your friends, and join us at the Waterfall lawn every Thursday between 4:30-8PM during dinner! We will offer Vegetarian options as well as allergen free food from the Simple serving station.
item.author: Students

item.title: Summer Parking Permits Now Available for Purchase
item.description: Students enrolled in summer classes and Arch: Summer parking permits are now on sale! Please be sure to purchased your summer parking permit to avoid any parking violations. Permits are required on all Rensselaer property. To register please visit: https://rpi.aimsparking.com If you have any questions, please contact Parking and Transportation at 518-276-6616 or parking@rpi.edu. Drive safely and have a great summer semester!
item.author: Students

item.title: Summer Arch Shuttle Service
item.description: Parking and Transportation is pleased to announce to the Rensselaer community that the Summer Arch shuttle service will begin on Monday, May 19th. Shuttle operating hours are posted on the Parking and Transportation website. Any questions please call Parking and Transportation at 518-276-6616.
